participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, enjoys artistic activities.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. I take dance lessons once a week. I also like old school hip hop. I love new kids on the block.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Active and health-conscious with a passion for sports.
participant_2.background: I am a woman. I'm married. I'm a vegetarian. I enjoy sports such as running.
